Translations.Text: a visayadalli avara niluvugalu tira bhinnavagive
mattu navu nim'ma nidreyannu (nim'ma palige) visrantiyagisiruvevu
mattu nim'ma mele balisthavada elu vastu (akasa)galannu nirmisiruvevu
mattu navu suryanannu ondu ujvala jyotiyagisiruvevu
mattu navu modagalinda dharakara nirannu surisiruvevu
a mulaka vividha bele hagu tarakarigalannu belesalikkagi
kahaleyannu uduva dina nivu dandu dandugalagi baruviri
akasavannu teredu bidalaguvudu mattu adaralli (ellellu) bagilugale iruvavu
mattu parvatagalannu nadesalaguvudu, avu maralinantagi biduvavu
yuga yugantara kala avaru adaralli biddu kondiruvaru
alli avaru yavude tampu vastuvina athava yavude paniyada ruci kanalararu
alli avarige siguvudu, kudiyuva niru mattu hariyuva kivu matra
idiga saviyiri. Innu nim'ma palige sikseya horatu berenu heccadu
alli avaru yavude asabhya matannagali sullannagali kelalararu
idu satphalavagide, nim'ma odeyana kadeyinda. (Allade nimagagi) dharala udugoregalive
avanu akasagala hagu bhumiya mattu averadara naduve iruva ellavugala odeyanu, avanu parama dayamayanu. Avanodane matanaduva adhikara yarigu illa
Ruh (jib‌ril) mattu itara malak‌galu salagi nilluva a dina, a parama dayamayana appane padedavaru hagu sariyadudannu heluvavara horatu yarigu matanadalu sadhyavagadu
a dinavu nijakku baralide. Ista ullavanu tanna odeyana bali asrayavannu padedu kollali

nanantu nim'mannu, sighrave baraliruva sikseya kuritu eccarisuttiruvenu. Andu pratiyobbanu tanna kaigalu munde kalisiruvudannu (karmavannu) kanuvanu mattu dhikkariyu, ‘‘ayyo, nanu mannagiddare cennagittu’’ ennuvanu
a maralikeyu tira nastada vyavaharavagide endu avaru heluttare
adara bennige avarella ondu bayalalli seruvaru
avara odeyanu avarannu pavitra ‘‘tuva’’ bettadinda karedu (helidanu)
mattu avanodane heliri – ninu nirmalanaga bayasuveya
nanu ninage ninnodeyana kadegiruva dariyannu toraballenu – ninu bhayabhakti ullavanagabekendu
adare avanu tiraskarisidanu mattu avara adesavannu miridanu
a balika avanu marali sancu huda todagidanu
mattu nane nim'ma ati dodda odeyanu endu ghosisidanu
Konege allahanu avanannu hididu paralokada mattu ihalokada siksege guripadisidanu
nim'mannu srstisuvudu kastavo athava akasagalanno? Avanu avugalannu racisiruvanu
avanu avugalannu ettarakkerisiruvanu hagu avugalige rupa kottiruvanu
avanu irulannu kattalagisiruvanu mattu bisilannu horadisiruvanu
avanu adarinda nirannu horadisi mevannu belesiruvanu
idella nim'ma labhakkagi hagu nim'ma januvarugaligagi
andu manusyanu tanu madiddellavannu smarisi kolluvanu
innu tanna odeyana munde nillalikkide endu anjuttiddavanu mattu tanna sveccheyannu niyantrisuttiddavanu –
(punarut'thanada) a ghaligeyu endu baruvudu? Endu avaru prasnisuttare
a kuritu antima jnanavu nim'modeyana bali ide
(dutare,) nivantu bhaya bhakti ullavarannu eccarisuvavaru matra
avaru adannu (paralokavannu) kannare kandaga, tavu (ihalokadalli) kaledudu kevala ondu sanje athava ondu munjane matra endu kolluvaru
athava upadesada kuritu avanu cintisa bahudu mattu avanige
viryadinda. Avanu (allahanu) atanannu srstisidanu hagu atana vidhiyannu niscayisidanu
a balika avanige badukina dariyannu sugamagolisidanu
a balika avanannu sayisi avanannu gorige talupisidanu
a balika avanu, tanicchisidaga avanannu punah jivantagolisuvanu
hagalla, avanu (manavanu) tanage nidalada adesavannu palisalilla
nimagagi hagu nim'ma januvarugaligagi idannella madalayitu
andu manusyanu tanna sahodaraninda dura oduvanu
matte kelavu mukhagala mele andu dhulu tumbiruvudu
hagalla – nanu, hinnadeyuva naksatragala ane hakuttene
avanu tumba balisthanu visva sinhasanada odeyana bali unnata sthana ullavanu agiddane
avaru ajnata lokada mahitigalannu talupisuvudaralli jipunaralla
nim'ma paiki ista ullavanu nera margavannu hidiyali
nim'ma iccheyinda enu aguvudilla – sarvalokagala odeyanada allahanu icchisuva tanaka
pratiyobbanu ariyuvanu, tanu munde kalisiddannu mattu hinde bittu bandudannu
manavane, a ninna udari odeyana visayadalli ninnannu mosagolisida vastu yavudu
Avane ninnannu srstisidanu (ninna angangagalannu) saripadisidanu, santulitavagi ninnannu racisidanu
hagalla – nijavagi, nivu pratiphalada dinavannu tiraskarisuttiri
andu yarindalu yarigu kincittu prayojanavagadu. Adhikaravu andu sampurnavagi allahanaddagiruvudu
avaru janarinda aledu padeyuvaga purnavagi padeyuttare
adare itararige aledu athava tugi koduvaga kadimegolisi koduttare
avarannu matte jivanta golisalaguvudendu avarigenu tiliyade
nijavagi, elle mirida papi matra adannu dhikkarisuttane
avanige nam'ma vacanagalannu odi kelisaladaga avanu, ivella gatakalada kathegalu ennuttane
hagalla – nijavagi avaru madidda karmagalu avara manas'sugalige tukku hidisive
hagalla – andu avaru tanna odeyaninda mareyalliruvaru
nivu tiraskarisuttiddudu idanne endu avarodane helalaguvudu
nivu avara mukhagalalli sukhada ullasavannu kanuviri
avarige mudre haki muccittidda sud'dha madireyannu kudisalaguvudu
adara mudre kasturiyaddagiruvudu, spardhisuvavaru idannu padeyalu spardhisali
adondu cilume. Allahana aptaragiruvavaru (svargavasigalu) adannu sevisuvaru
avara baliyinda hadu hoguvaga tatsaradinda kai sannegalannu maduttiddaru
avaru tam'ma maneyavara balige maraluvaga hem'meyinda bigutta maraluttiddaru
avaru ivarannu (visvasigalannu) kandaga, ivaru darigettavaru ennuttiddaru
adare indu visvasigalu dhikkarigalannu kandu naguvaru
dhikkarigalige sikki bittite, avaru maduttidda krtyagala pratiphala
adu tanna odeyana adesavannu palisuvudu mattu adu adara kartavyavagiruvudu
adu tannolagiruva ellavannu hora haki khaliyagi biduvudu
adu tanna odeyana adesavannu palisuvudu mattu adu adara kartavyavagiruvudu
manavane, ninu kramena ninnodeyana kadege hoguttiruve, ninu khandita avanannu bhetiyaguve
yara karma patravannu avana balagaiyalli nidalayito –
Mattu avanu tanna maneyavara jote santustanagiruvanu
yarige avana granthavannu avana benna hindininda nidalayito
(ihalokadalli) avanu tanna maneyavara jote mai maretiddanu
tanendu (tanna odeyana balige) hogalikke illavendu bhavisiddanu
yakilla; avana odeyanantu avanannu noduttale iddanu
alla; nanu sanjeya kembannada ane hakuttene
mattu irulina hagu adu enannella avarisuttado avugala ane
avara munde kur‌anannu odaladaga avareke sastanga veraguvudilla
avaru tam'ma manas'sugalalli adagisiruva ellavannu allahanu ballanu
avarige ondu kathina sikseya subhavarte nidiri
visvasavittu satkarma madidavara horatu – avarige apara pratiphalavide
hajaraguvavana mattu yara munde hajaru padisalaguvudo avanane
mattu avaru visvasigalige tavu niduttiddudannu (citra hinseyannu) noduttiddaru
avaru a visvasigala virud'dha pratikaravesagalu ilidudakke, avaru (a visvasigalu) prabalanu prasansar'hanu ada allahanalli nambike ittaru embudaste karanavagittu
akasagala mattu bhumiya adhipatyavu avanige (allahanige) seride. Mattu allahanu elladakku nera saksiyagiddane
Visvasi purusaru mattu striyarannu hinsisidavaru hagu a kuritu pascattapa padadavaru – avarige narakada sikse kadide mattu avarige suduva sikse kadide
visvasigalige hagu satkarmagalannu madidavarige taladalli nadigalu hariyuva svarga totagalu siguvavu. Idu nijakku dodda saubhagyavagide
khanditavagiyu avane srsti karyavannu arambhisidavanu mattu avane adannu punaravartisuvanu (punah srstisuvanu)
tannannu yavudarinda srstisalagide endu manusyanom'me nodali
adu bennu hagu edeya madhyadinda horaduttade
avanu avanannu (manusyanannu) mattom'me srstisalu khandita samarthanagiddane
manadolagina rahasyagala parisilane (antima vicarane) nadeyuva dina
andu avana (manavana) bali yava saktiyu iradu. Yava sahayakanu iralaranu
niviga dhikkarigalige kalavakasavannu nidiri. Kevala svalpa kalavakasa
navu nimage odisuvevu matte nivu mareyalariri
allahanu icchisiddara horatu. Avanu bahirangavadudannu mattu guptavadudannu khandita ballanu
navu nim'ma palige sulabhada hadiyannu sugama golisuvevu
adaralli avanige sayalikku agadu badukalikku agadu
mattu tannodeyana hesarannu smarisidavanu mattu namajhannu sallisidavanu
adare nivu ihalokada jivanakke prasastya niduttiri
nijavagi paralokavu uttamavagide – mattu adu sada ulidiruttade
ellavannu avarisuva (lokantya) dinada varteyu nimage talupideye
mullina gidada horatu bere yava aharavu avarige sigadu
adarinda avarige pustateyu sigadu mattu avara hasivu nigadu
avaru hennonteyatta noduvudillave – avugalannu yava riti srstisalagide endu
mattu akasadedege, (noduvudillave,) adannu yava riti ettarisalagide endu
mattu parvatagaledege, (noduvudillave) avugalannu yava riti nedalagide endu
mattu bhumiyedege, (noduvudillave) adannu yava riti hasalagide endu
(dutare,) nivu bodhisiri, ekendare nivu bodhakare agiddiri
mattu avara vicaraneya honeyu nam'ma melide
nivu nodidira, nim'ma odeyanu ad janangadavarige enu madidanembudannu
nadugala paiki antaha innondu nadu srstiyagilla
konege nim'modeyanu avara mele sikseya catiyannu bisidanu
manusyanannu avana odeyanu pariksegolapadisi avanige gauravavannu. Anugrahavannu dayapalisidaga avanu, nannodeyanu nannannu gauravanvitanagisiddane ennuttane
innu avanu atanannu pariksegolapadisi avana adayavannu simita golisidaga avanu nannodeyanu nannannu nicanagisiddane ennuttane
andu narakavannu munde taralaguvudu. Andu manusyanige visayavu arthavaguvudu. Adare andu arthavadare avanigenu labha
avanu heluvanu; ayyo, nanu i badukige purva sid'dhate nadesabekittu
andu avanu (allahanu) niduvantaha sikseyannu bere yaru nidalararu
mattu avanu kattiduva ritiyalli bere yaru kattidalaranu
santrptanagi maralu ninna odeyanedege – avanu ninninda santrpta nagiruvanu
illa, nanu i nagarada ane hakuttene
tanna mele yarigu niyantranavillavendu avanu bhavisiddaneye
nanu bahalastu sampattannu vyarthagolisiddene endavanu heluttane
adare avanu eru hadiyannu kramisalu nirakarisidanu
nimagenu gottu a eru hadi enendu
(idannu madidavanu) visvasigala, paraspara sahaneyannu bodhisuvavara hagu paraspara karuneyannu bodhisuvavara salige serirabeku
a balika adakke dustatanada hagu dharma nistheya arivu nididavanane
samud janangadavaru tam'ma ahankarada karana (dutarannu) tiraskarisidaru
aga allahana dutaru – allahana onte mattu avara niru kudiyuva saradiya kuritu eccaravirali – endaru

adare avaru avara (dutara) matannu (sullendu) tiraskarisidaru hagu adara (onteya) kalugalannu kadidu bittaru. Aga avara papada karana avara odeyanu avara melondu sikseyannu eragisidanu hagu avarannu nelasama golisibittanu
– avana palige navu saralavada margada sulabha golisuvevu
– avana palige navu kathinavada margavannu sulabhagolisuvevu
avanu uruli biddaga avana sampattu avana yava kelasakku baradu
dari toruva honeyu khandita nam'ma melide
Nanu nimage dhagadhagisuva agniya kuritu munneccarike niduttiddene
– avanu (satyavannu) tiraskarisidavanu hagu adarinda mukha tirugisi kondavanu
avanu parisud'dhanagalikkagi tanna sampattannu (sanmargadalli) dana maduttane
avanu maru pavatisabekada yava rnavu avana melilla –
avanu (maduva danavella) kevala tanna paramonnata odeyanannu (allahanannu) meccisuvudakkagi matravagiruttade
(dutare,) nim'ma odeyanu nim'mannu toredilla mattu avanu nim'minda munidu kondilla
nim'ma palige anantaraddu modalinadakkinta (paralokavu ihalokakkinta) uttamavagide
sighrave nim'modeyanu, nivu santrptaraguvastannu nimage niduvanu
nivu anatharagiddudannu kandu avanu nimage asraya nidiralillave
nivu dari tiliyadavaragiddudannu kandu avanu nimage dari toralillave
mattu nivu daridradalliddudannu kandu avanu nim'mannu sampanna ragisalillave
mattu nim'ma odeyana kodugegalannu (janarige) vivaravagi tilisiri
mattu navu nim'ma melinda nim'ma bharavannu ilisillave
nivinnu nimage biduvu sikkaga (allahanannu meccisuva) sramadalli todagiri
a balika navu avanannu tira kelamattakke maralisidevu
visvasigaladavaru hagu satkarmagalannu maduvavara horatu – avarige apara pratiphalavide
avanu manusyanannu heppu gattida raktadinda srstisiruvanu
khandita (ellaru) nim'ma odeyana kadege marala bekagide
nivu nodidira? Ondu vele avanu saridariyalliddare
athava avanu satyanistheyannu bodhisiddare (avanannu tadedavana gati enaditu)
nivu nodidira? Avanu (tadeyuvavanu, satyavannu) tiraskarisuvavanu hagu kadeganisuvavanagiddare (avana gati enaditu)
ondu vele avanu tannannu tadeyadiddare, navu avana taleya juttannu hididu eledoyyuvevu
(dutare,) beda. Nivu avana adesavannu palisabedi. Nivu sastangaveragiri mattu (namage) nikataragiri
a gauravanvita ratriyu savira tingalugaliginta sresthavagide
Adaralli malak‌galu mattu ruh (jibril) tam'ma odeyana adesadante, ella erpadugalondige ilidu baruttare
granthadavara mattu bahudevaradhakara paiki dhikkarigalu, tam'ma balige spasta puraveyu bandu biduva tanaka (tam'ma dhoraneyannu) kai biduvavaragiralilla
(idiga) pavana putagalannu odi kelisuva allahana dutaru (avara balige bandiruvaru)
(i hindeyu) granthadavaru, tam'ma balige spastavada puravegalu banda balikavaste, chinna bhinnaragiddaru

nistheyannu avanige (allahanige) misalagittu, ekagrateyondige allahanannu aradhisabeku, namajhannu sallisabeku mattu jhakatannu pavatisabeku – iduve sthiravada dharma ende (i hindeyu) avarige adesisalagittu
granthadavara hagu bahudevaradhakara paiki dhikkarigalu sadakala narakadalliruvaru – avare atyanta nica jivigalu
visvasigalu mattu satkarmagalannu madidavaru – khandita avare atyuttama jivigalu

avara pratiphalavu avara odeyana bali – taladalli nadigalu hariyuvantaha svargada rupadallide. Adaralli avaru sadakala iruvaru. Allahanu avarinda santustanagiruvanu mattu avaru allahaninda santustaragiruvaru. Idu tam'ma odeyanige anjuttiddavarigagi iruva pratiphala
mattu bhumiyu tanna horeyannella hora celluvaga
andu adu (bhumiyu) tanna samacaragalannella tilisi biduvudu
ekendare, adara odeyanu (hage madalu) adakke adesisiruvanu
andu janaru gumpu gumpagi hora baruvaru – tam'ma karmagalannu kanalikkagi
mattu kincittadaru kedukannu madidavanu adannu kanuvanu
munjavina hottu avu dhali madi biduttave
avanige tilidillave, gorigalolage iruvavarannella hora tegeyalaguva dinada kuritu
mattu manas'sugalolage iruva ellavannu prakata padisalaguva dinada kuritu
andu avara odeyanu khandita avara kuritu ellavannu ballavanagiruvanu
khandita idu sariyalla, nimage begane tiliyalide
matte, khandita idu sariyalla. Nimage begane tiliyalide
khandita idu sariyalla, nimage (i vastavavu) jnana tumbida nambikeyondige tilididdare cennagittu
matte, nambike tumbida kannugalinda nivu adannu khandita kanuviri
konege a dina nim'modane, nimage nidalagidda kodugegala kuritu prasnisalaguvudu
nambike irisida, olleya kelasagalannu madida mattu paraspararige satyavannu bodhisida mattu sahaneyannu bodhisidavara horatu
Vinasakadide, janarannu (avara munde) mudalisuva mattu (avara benna hinde) dusisuva, pratiyobbanige
tanna sampattu tannannu ciranjiviyagisi biduttadendu avanu grahisuttane
nivu kandillave, nim'modaneyanu aneyavarige enu madidanendu
mattu avanu avara virud'dha paksigala padegalannu kaluhisidanu
avu avara mele haralu kallugalannu eseyuttiddavu
konege avanu avarannu tindu karagida hullinantagisi bittanu
avarige caligala mattu besige kalada prayanavannu paricitagolisiddakkagi
avane, avaru hasididdaga avarige unisidavanu mattu bhayadinda (raksisi) avarige santi odagisidavanu
nivu kandira, pratiphalada dina sullendu tiraskarisuvatanannu
avaru, tam'ma namajh‌na visayadalli udasina taliddare
nivinnu nim'modeyanigagi namajh sallisiri mattu balidana nidiri
mattu nivu kuda nanu pujisuvatanannu pujisalariri
nim'ma dharma nimage mattu nanna dharma nanage
mattu janaru samuhagalagi allahana dharmadolage pravesisuvudannu nivu kandaga
nim'modeyana prasanseyondige, avana gunagana madiri mattu avaninda ksame yacisiri. Khanditavagiyu avanu pade pade pascattapa svikarisuvavanagiddane
muridu hodavu, abulahab‌na eradu kaigalu mattu avanu nasavadanu
avana sampattinindagali sampadaneyindagali avanige yavude labhavagalilla
mattu uruvalu horuva (janarannu pracodisuva) avana madadi
avanige yaru janisilla avanu yarigu janisidavanalla
heliri; nanu, munjavina odeya (allaha)nalli raksane koruttene –
mattu kattaleyu avarisuvaga, adara kedukininda (raksane koruttene)
mattu asoye paduvavanu asoye paduvaga, avana kedukininda (raksane koruttene)
heliri; nanu manavara odeya (allaha)nalli raksane koruttene
gondala huttisuvavana (mattu) avitukondu akramisuvavana (saitanana)kedukininda (raksisalu allahanalli koruttene)
anthavanu jinn‌gala paiki irabahudu mattu manavara paikiyu irabahudu
